purpose: The email announces the workshops that will be held in conjunction with the ER 2025 conference, highlighting their role as a collaborative forum for innovative ideas in conceptual modeling. It provides links to the respective workshops and details about the Call for Papers, including submission and notification deadlines. The email also lists the workshop chairs for any inquiries.

infos:
Subject: [CFP] ER2025 - List of Workshops
From: SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>
Reply-To:SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>
Date:Thu, 5 Jun 2025 13:51:25 -0000
Content-Type:text/plain
*6th International Workshop on Conceptual Modeling for Life Sciences (CMLS)*
*3rd International Workshop Modeling in the Age of Large Language Models
Common deadlines in all the five workshops are:

work_name_candidates.raw: 6th International Workshop on Conceptual Modeling for Life Sciences
work_name_candidates.evidence: *6th International Workshop on Conceptual Modeling for Life Sciences (CMLS)*

work_name_candidates.raw: 3rd International Workshop Modeling in the Age of Large Language Models
work_name_candidates.evidence: *3rd International Workshop Modeling in the Age of Large Language Models (LLM4Modeling)*
